definitions.definition: A tiny grain , a small particle .
A small structure in a cell .
A particle from 2 to 4 mm in diameter , following the Wentworth scale
a small mark in the photosphere of the sun caused by convection currents . See also Wikipedia:Granule (solar physics) .

main_definition: A tiny grain , a small particle .
secondary_definitions: ( biology ) A small structure in a cell .
( geology ) A particle from 2 to 4 mm in diameter , following the Wentworth scale
( astronomy ) a small mark in the photosphere of the sun caused by convection currents . See also Wikipedia:Granule (solar physics) .
